# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(TraceHistory)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
TraceHistoryPluginInfo.C
TraceHistoryCommonPluginInfo.C
TraceHistoryAttributes.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES 
TraceHistoryPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBG_SOURCES
TraceHistoryGUIPluginInfo.C
QvisTraceHistoryWindow.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)
SET(LIBG_MOC_SOURCES
QvisTraceHistoryWindow.h
)
QT_WRAP_CPP(GTraceHistoryOperator LIBG_SOURCES ${LIBG_MOC_SOURCES})

SET(LIBV_SOURCES
TraceHistoryViewerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
TraceHistoryEnginePluginInfo.C
avtTraceHistoryFilter.C
avtExtrudedVolWriter.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_COMMON_INCLUDES}
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/MetaData
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/SIL
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Database
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Expressions/Abstract
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Expressions/CMFE
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Expressions/Conditional
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Expressions/Derivations
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Expressions/General
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Expressions/ImageProcessing
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Expressions/Management
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Expressions/Math
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Expressions/MeshQuality
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/FileWriter
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Filters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/IVP
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Math
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/AbstractFilters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Data
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Pipeline
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sinks
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sources
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Plotter
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/QtVisWindow
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/View
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/Colleagues
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/Interactors
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/Proxies
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/Tools
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/VisWindow
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/gui
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/mdserver/proxy
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/mdserver/rpc
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/viewer/main
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/viewer/proxy
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/viewer/rpc
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/winutil
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/full
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/lightweight
${QT_INCLUDE_DIR}
${QT_QTCORE_INCLUDE_DIR}
${QT_QTGUI_INCLUDE_DIR}
${VTK_INCLUDE_DIRS} 
${PYTHON_INCLUDE_PATH} 
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visitpy/visitpy 
)


LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${QT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${MESA_LIBRARY_DIR} ${GLEW_LIBRARY_DIR} ${VTK_LIBRARY_DIRS})

ADD_LIBRARY(ITraceHistoryOperator ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ITraceHistoryOperator visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ITraceHistoryOperator)

IF(NOT VISIT_SERVER_COMPONENTS_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(GTraceHistoryOperator ${LIBG_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(GTraceHistoryOperator visitcommon gui )

    ADD_LIBRARY(VTraceHistoryOperator ${LIBV_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(VTraceHistoryOperator visitcommon viewer )
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} GTraceHistoryOperator VTraceHistoryOperator)

    IF(VISIT_PYTHON_SCRIPTING)
        SET(LIBS_SOURCES
            TraceHistoryScriptingPluginInfo.C
            PyTraceHistoryAttributes.C
            ${COMMON_SOURCES}
        )
        ADD_LIBRARY(STraceHistoryOperator ${LIBS_SOURCES})
        TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(STraceHistoryOperator visitcommon visitpy ${PYTHON_LIBRARY})
        SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} STraceHistoryOperator)
    ENDIF(VISIT_PYTHON_SCRIPTING)

    IF(VISIT_JAVA)
        ADD_CUSTOM_TARGET(JavaTraceHistory ALL ${CMAKE_Java_COMPILER} ${CMAKE_Java_FLAGS} -d ${VISIT_BINARY_DIR}/java -classpath ${VISIT_BINARY_DIR}/java TraceHistoryAttributes.java)
        ADD_DEPENDENCIES(JavaTraceHistory JavaClient)
    ENDIF(VISIT_JAVA)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_SERVER_COMPONENTS_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(ETraceHistoryOperator_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ETraceHistoryOperator_ser visitcommon avtexpressions_ser avtfilters_ser avtpipeline_ser )
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} ETraceHistoryOperator_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(ETraceHistoryOperator_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ETraceHistoryOperator_par visitcommon avtexpressions_par avtfilters_par avtpipeline_par )
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} ETraceHistoryOperator_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_OPERATOR_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})

VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_PREFIX(${INSTALLTARGETS})
